caption.body: Kenya’s bold approach to combatting plastic waste is illuminated through the words and deeds of that nation’s activists, merchants, entrepreneurs, and innovators, including a shipbuilder making a sailing vessel completely of recycled plastic. See “Plastic: A Second Life” by Simon+Ben, @borderland_studios and three other shorts now playing in the Video Arts screening room located pre-security in the International Terminal Main Hall. http://bit.ly/2ZIYp5W
caption.excerpt: Kenya’s bold approach to combatting plastic waste is illuminated through the words and deeds of that nation’s activists, merchants, entrepreneurs, and innovators, including a shipbuilder making a sailing vessel completely of recycled plastic.
